configurations.name: producer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic to which the scheduling service will produce schedules.

configurations.name: consumer_topic
configurations.description: Kafka topic to which the scheduling service will consume status and intent updates.

configurations.name: exp_delta
configurations.description: Time(in seconds) without receiving status & intent updates after which a vehicle is no longer considered!

configurations.name: stop_distance
configurations.description: Maximum distance(in meters) from the end of an entry-lane at which point a vehicle can be considered stopped.

configurations.name: stop_speed
configurations.description: Maximum speed(in m/s) of vehicle for considering vehicle stopped at intersection.

configurations.name: max_valid_speed
configurations.description: Maximum speed(in m/s) of vehicle for consideration for scheduling.

configurations.name: scheduling_delta
configurations.description: Time(in seconds) interval between scheduling calculations.

configurations.name: enable_schedule_logging
configurations.description: Bool flag to enable schedule calculation csv logging.

configurations.name: schedule_log_path
configurations.description: File path where schedule calculation csv file will be written(Note: set enable_schedule_logging true).

configurations.name: schedule_log_filename
configurations.description: Filename for schedule calculation csv logging (Note: set enable_schedule_logging true).
